name: Assault Rifle
description: High damage machine rifle.

name: Handmade Shell
description: Shoddy ammo with multiple projectiles.

name: Pistol Bullet
description: Ammunition for a Pistol.

name: Incendiary Pistol Bullet
description: Slower moving ammunition that deals fire damage. There's a small chance it will start a fire.

name: HV Pistol Ammo
description: This ammunition travels faster, resulting in less drop and slightly higher damage.

name: 5.56 Rifle Ammo
description: Ammunition for a Rifle.

name: Explosive 5.56 Rifle Ammo
description: This ammo explodes on contact dealing a small amount of fragmentation damage to nearby objects.

name: Incendiary 5.56 Rifle Ammo
description: Slower moving ammunition that deals fire damage. There's a small chance it will start a fire.

name: HV 5.56 Rifle Ammo
description: This ammunition travels faster, resulting in less drop and slightly higher damage.

name: Rocket
description: Ammunition for a Rocket Launcher.

name: Incendiary Rocket
description: Creates flames upon impact.

name: High Velocity Rocket
description: Fast moving rocket ammunition.

name: 12 Gauge Buckshot
description: Ammunition for a Shotgun.

name: 12 Gauge Slug
description: Single large projectile for a Shotgun.

name: Anti-Radiation Pills
description: Taking these pills will lower your radiation level. WARNING: May cause extreme dehydration

name: Apple
description: An Apple. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Rotten Apple
description: A rotten apple. Eating it currently provides a tiny boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

name: High Velocity Arrow
description: Lighter, faster arrow that deals less damage.

name: Wooden Arrow
description: An arrow for a Hunting Bow and Crossbow.

name: Auto Turret
description: This automated sentry turret will engage and neutralize any moving targets it has line of sight to. You must load it with standard 5.56 ammunition. Note : The turret will search for targets in a 180 degree arc facing *you* when you place it.

name: Salvaged Axe
description: A high-yield resource gathering axe. Slower than the Hatchet.

name: Bandage
description: Heal yourself or others with this bandage. Left-click heals you, right-click heals a target.

name: Concrete Barricade
description: A barricade made out of Stones.

name: Metal Barricade
description: A tough metal barricade with barbed wire, made from Metal Fragments. The barbed wire causes damage and will also slow player movement.

name: Sandbag Barricade
description: A protective barricade made out of Sand Bags.

name: Stone Barricade
description: A protective barricade made out of Stones.

name: Wooden Barricade
description: A wooden barricade. Will hurt players and animals that run into it.

name: Barbed Wooden Barricade
description: A wooden barricade with barbed wire, made of Wood and Metal Fragments. The barbed wire causes damage and will also slow player movement.

name: Battery - Small
description: A Battery.

name: Snap Trap
description: A metal trap that can injure people and animals.

name: Bed
description: A Bed. Placing this will give you a place to respawn and can be used much more frequently than a sleeping bag. Note: Must be placed inside a building
descriptions: 120 second cooldown between respawns. Triggers cooldown on all beds within 50m.

name: Black Raspberries
description: Black Raspberries picked from berry bushes. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Bleach
description: A powerful oxidizing agent. Can be used as a disinfectant

name: Blood
description: Used in creation of medkits

name: Blueberries
description: Blueberries picked from berry bushes. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Blueprint
description: Blueprint

name: Bolt Action Rifle
description: A high powered, highly accurate rifle.

name: Bone Club
description: A blunt weapon made from a femur. All around basic gathering tool.

name: Bone Fragments
description: Extracted from animal carcass.  Used as a raw material to make a bone blade, a bone awl, bone meal, or used to make glue.

name: Bota Bag
description: A canteen used to carry Water. Left click to drink, right click to fill from water sources, or to pour out

name: Hunting Bow
description: A bow. For hunting.

name: Large Wood Box
description: Keep your things in this wooden storage box. Stores up to 30 items.

name: Wood Storage Box
description: Keep your things in this wooden storage box. Stores up to 12 items.

name: Water Bucket
description: A bucket for transporting water or other liquids

name: Building Plan
description: A building plan. You can use this to craft buildings

name: Burlap Shirt
description: A Shirt made out of burlap.

name: Burlap Shoes
description: Shoes made out of burlap.

name: Cactus Flesh
description: Flesh of a Cactus, contains water.

name: Camera
description: A camera. Take screenshots with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and lock focus with third fire.

name: Camp Fire
description: A small camp fire. Provides warmth and light, and you can cook with it.

name: Can of Beans
description: Beans found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
descriptions: 50% chance to give Empty Can Of Beans.

name: Empty Can Of Beans
description: An empty Can of Beans. Can be smelted into Metal Fragments.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 30 seconds to get x15 Metal Fragments

name: Can of Tuna
description: Chunked tuna found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
descriptions: 50% chance to give Empty Tuna Can.

name: Empty Tuna Can
description: An empty Can of Tuna. Can be smelted into Metal Fragments.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 30 seconds to get x10 Metal Fragments

name: Candy Cane
description: A Festive Candy Cane

name: CCTV Camera
description: A somewhat broken CCTV camera, Unusable in its current form

name: Ceiling Light
description: A small ceiling mounted light source.
descriptions: Uses 1 Low Grade Fuel every 600 seconds.

name: Charcoal
description: Charcoal from a fire.

name: Burned Chicken
description: Burned chicken. Eating it will damage your health.

name: Cooked Chicken.
description: Cooked chicken. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 60 seconds to get x1 Burned Chicken

name: Raw Chicken Breast
description: Raw chicken breast. Eating it will damage your health.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 30 seconds to get x1 Cooked Chicken.

name: Spoiled Chicken
description: Spoiled Chicken. Eating it will damage your health.

name: Chocolate Bar
description: Chocolate Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Cloth
description: Cloth from an animal or a Hemp Bush. Used in many clothing items, weapons, and more.

name: Coal :(
description: Crappy Holidays!

name: Corn
description: An ear of corn. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Corn Seed
description: Seeds can be eaten or planted.

name: Crossbow
description: A very accurate ranged weapon.

name: Crude Oil
description: Raw Oil out of the ground, must be refined in a refinery to be used.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 10 seconds to get x3 Low Grade Fuel

name: Tool Cupboard
description: Placing and authorising with the cupboard will make it so only you can build in a 50 meter radius of it. If you want your friends to build, they'll need to auth too. You should protect this.

name: Sheet Metal Double Door
description: A hinged double door which is made out of sheets of metal and wood

name: Armored Double Door
description: A hinged double door which is made out of armored metal

name: Wood Double Door
description: A hinged double door which is made out of wood

name: Sheet Metal Door
description: A hinged door which is made out of sheets of metal and wood

name: Armored Door
description: A hinged door which is made out of reinforced metal and wood

name: Wooden Door
description: A hinged door which is made out of wood

name: Door Key
description: A key to a door, created from a Lock.

name: Duct Tape
description: A versatile adhesive tape reinforced with cloth

name: Satchel Charge
description: Small explosive package constructed of beancan grenades. Useful for destroying wood and sheet metal doors

name: Timed Explosive Charge
description: C4, useful for breaking into bases.

name: Explosives
description: Explosives, a component of C4.

name: Animal Fat
description: Fat from an animal.

name: Cooked Fish
description: Cooked Fish. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 60 seconds to get x1 Charcoal

name: Raw Fish
description: Raw Fish
descriptions: Can be cooked for 20 seconds to get x1 Cooked Fish

name: Flame Thrower
description: A Flamethrower. Uses low grade fuel as ammunition

name: Flare
description: Light up the night sky with this brand new red flare!

name: Weapon Flashlight
description: Weapon flashlight

name: A floor grill
description: A floor grill

name: Ladder Hatch
description: A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder

name: Low Grade Fuel
description: Low Grade Fuel, used to power light sources

name: Furnace
description: A Furnace. Use it to smelt mined ore.

name: Large Furnace
description: A Large Furnace.Use it to smelt ore.

name: High External Stone Gate
description: A high stone gate, allowing access in and out of your compound

name: High External Wooden Gate
description: A high wooden gate, allowing access in and out of your compound

name: Gears
description: A selection of gears. Some functional, some not.

name: Leather Gloves
description: Gloves made out of burlap.

name: Glue
description: A strong adhesive

name: Granola Bar
description: Granola Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Beancan Grenade
description: Unreliable explosive device.

name: F1 Grenade
description: Reliable explosive device.

name: Acoustic Guitar
description: A type of instrument. Play with primary and secondary fire. Change your view angle to alter the pitch.

name: Gun Powder
description: Made from Sulphur and Charcoal.

name: Hide Halterneck
description: A Halterneck made from the hide of an animal.

name: Hammer
description: A Hammer, used to upgrade building materials. Right-click for the options.

name: Salvaged Hammer
description: A Hammer made from a bunch of other crap.

name: Beenie Hat
description: A wooly hat.

name: Boonie Hat
description: A boonie hat

name: Bucket Helmet
description: A Bucket Helmet. It provides a level of regional protection from inflicted damage.

name: Burlap Headwrap
description: A Headwrap made out of burlap.

name: Candle Hat
description: A hat with a candle on top. You can turn the candle on in your inventory.

name: Baseball Cap
description: A baseball cap.

name: Coffee Can Helmet
description: A Coffee Can Helmet. It provides a level of regional protection from inflicted damage.

name: Bone Helmet
description: A helmet made of bone

name: Miners Hat
description: A leather cap with a flashlight attached. It uses Low Grade Fuel and can be activated from the inventory.

name: Riot Helmet
description: A makeshift riot Helmet. Great at deflecting melee attacks.

name: Wolf Headdress
description: A headdress made out of the scraped out head of a wolf.

name: Hatchet
description: A Hatchet, useful for chopping trees and dismembering corpses.

name: Hazmat Boots
description: Boots made from radiation resistant rubber.

name: Hazmat Gloves
description: Gloves made from radiation resistant rubber.

name: Hazmat Helmet
description: A Helmet.

name: Hazmat Jacket
description: A Jacket made from radiation resistant rubber.

name: Hazmat Pants
description: Trousers made from radiation resistant rubber.

name: Hazmat Suit
description: A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.

name: Hemp Seed
description: Seeds can be eaten or planted.

name: Hide Boots
description: Boots made from the hide of an animal.

name: Hide Skirt
description: A Skirt made from the hide of an animal.

name: Hide Vest
description: A Vest made from the hide of an animal.

name: Holosight
description: Uses laser projection to create a holographic sight which is always pointing at the target regardless of view angle.

name: Hoodie
description: A hoodie.

name: High Quality Metal Ore
description: A rock containing High Quality Metal. Can be smelted in a furnace.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 20 seconds to get x1 High Quality Metal

name: Burned Human Meat
description: Burned Meat from a human being. Consuming will damage your health.

name: Cooked Human Meat
description: Meat from a human being. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 60 seconds to get x1 Burned Human Meat

name: Raw Human Meat
description: Raw human meat. Consuming will damage your health.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 30 seconds to get x1 Cooked Human Meat

name: Spoiled Human Meat
description: Spoiled Human Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

name: Salvaged Icepick
description: A salvaged Icepick.

name: Bone Armor
description: A suit of armor made of bones

name: Snow Jacket - Red
description: A thick, high visibility Jacket. It will help keep you warm in any climate.

name: Jacket
description: A rugged jacket.

name: Jack O Lantern Angry
description: A Lantern. Place it where you need light.

name: Jack O Lantern Happy
description: A Lantern. Place it where you need light.

name: Bone Knife
description: Melee weapon crafted from bone and wood. Best in class at harvesting flesh.

name: Wooden Ladder
description: A ladder will help you climb walls in any base.

name: Land Mine
description: An old military Landmine. If you stand on one, you can ask a friend to disarm it before it explodes.

name: Lantern
description: A Lantern. Place it where you need light.
descriptions: Uses 1 Low Grade Fuel every 600 seconds.

name: Large Medkit
description: A large medkit.

name: Weapon Lasersight
description: Weapon Lasersight

name: Leather
description: Leather from an animal. Used in many clothing items, weapons, and more.

name: Code Lock
description: An electronic lock. Locked and unlocked with four-digit code.

name: Lock
description: A Lock that requires a key.

name: Longsword
description: A powerful 2-handed melee weapon with good range and high damage.

name: LR-300 Assault Rifle
description: Stalk your enemies with this high powered assault rifle (temp desc)

name: M249
description: High damage, high rate of fire, belt fed light machinegun

name: M92 Pistol
description: A semi-automatic Pistol. Fires rapidly and with good accuracy. Military Grade

name: Mace
description: A powerful 2-handed melee weapon, It's unique design makes it easier to hit your target when compared to other more traditional weapons.

name: Machete
description: A brutal weapon with good range.

name: Paper Map
description:
Helps you figure out where you are. You can annotate the map by right-clicking and drawing on it.

Drag the map into your belt bar to make it active. You will then be able to view the map by holding down the map button (G by default).

name: Improvised Balaclava
description: A home made balaclava

name: Bandana Mask
description: A square of cloth which is tied around the face over the nose and mouth.

name: Metal Facemask
description: A protective facemask that deflects direct attacks.

name: Burnt Bear Meat
description: Bear Meat that has been overcooked

name: Bear Meat Cooked
description: Delicious Bear Meat
descriptions: Can be cooked for 30 seconds to get x1 Burnt Bear Meat

name: Bear Meat
description: Raw Bear Meat. Eating it will damage your health.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 30 seconds to get x1 Bear Meat Cooked

name: Burned Pork
description: This little piggy has been in the oven for too long
descriptions: Can be cooked for 120 seconds to get x1 Charcoal

name: Cooked Pork
description: Cooked pork, all ready to eat
descriptions: Can be cooked for 60 seconds to get x1 Burned Pork

name: Pork
description: Raw pork
descriptions: Can be cooked for 30 seconds to get x1 Cooked Pork

name: Burned Wolf Meat
description: Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

name: Cooked Wolf Meat
description: Cooked Wolf Meat. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 60 seconds to get x1 Burned Wolf Meat

name: Raw Wolf Meat
description: Raw Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 30 seconds to get x1 Cooked Wolf Meat

name: Spoiled Wolf Meat
description: Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

name: Metal Fragments
description: Metal Fragments. Smelted from Metal Ore, used in lots of different crafting recipes.

name: Metal Ore
description: A naturally occurring rock containing metal and metal compounds. You can extract this metal using a furnace.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 10 seconds to get x1 Metal Fragments

name: Metal Chest Plate
description: A metal plate covering your torso. Can deflect attacks.

name: High Quality Metal
description: High quality metal suitable for armor and weapons construction.

name: Metal Blade
description: A Metal Blade for making melee weapons

name: Metal Pipe
description: Metal Pipe

name: Pump Jack
description: Extracts oil from the ground. Use a Survey Charge to determine the amount of oil available for extraction in any given area.

name: Mining Quarry
description: Extracts minerals from the ground. Use a Survey Charge to determine the amount of minerals available for extraction in any given area.

name: Minnows
description: A Small group of edible fish

name: MP5A4
description: A medium damage machine gun.

name: Mushroom
description: A Mushroom found on the ground. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Muzzle Boost
description: Increases weapon fire rate by channeling gasses back into the weapon cycling it faster, at the cost of bullet velocity and accuracy

name: Muzzle Brake
description: Lowers recoil felt by the operator but can make bullet path more unpredictable

name: Note
description: A scrap of paper for leaving notes.

name: Burlap Trousers
description: Trousers made out of burlap.

name: Pants
description: Pants.

name: Hide Pants
description: Trousers made from the hide of an animal.

name: Road Sign Kilt
description: A shoddy piece of leg armor made from Metal Fragments and Leather.

name: Shorts
description: Trousers without the bottom of the legs

name: Paper
description: Paper.

name: Pick Axe
description: A Pickaxe, useful for gathering ore from rocks.

name: Eoka Pistol
description: A very basic Pistol that fires one Pistol Round at a time.

name: Revolver
description: A six-shooter.

name: Semi-Automatic Pistol
description: A sem-automatic Pistol. Fires rapidly and with good accuracy.

name: Large Planter Box
description: A place to plant plants

name: Small Planter Box
description: A small place to plant plants

name: Hide Poncho
description: A Poncho made from the hide of an animal.

name: Pookie Bear
description: A companion that reminds you of your youth

name: Large Present
description: A Large Present, the best there is. Unwrap it now!

name: Medium Present
description: A medium present, might be good! Collect 5 to upgrade to a larger present

name: Small Present
description: A small stocking stuffer present, Collect 10 to upgrade to a larger present

name: Empty Propane Tank
description: Strong metal object

name: Pumpkin
description: An edible vegetable that can also be worn as a hat. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

name: Pumpkin Seed
description: Seeds can be eaten or planted.

name: Reactive Target
description: A reactive target that knocks down when hit, can be reset.

name: Repair Bench
description: Repair items here.

name: Research Table
description: Research items here.

name: Research Paper
description: Use this item in a Research Bench to create blueprints of items

name: Rifle Body
description: The firing mechanism of a rifle. Used in construction of a weapon that can fire pistol ammo fully automatic

name: Road Sign Jacket
description: A shoddy piece of body armor made from Metal Fragments and Leather.

name: Road Signs
description: Some road signs made of metal

name: Rock
description: A Rock. The most basic melee weapon and gathering tool.

name: Rocket Launcher
description: Shoots rockets slighty farther than North Korea.

name: Rope
description: A Length of Rope

name: Salt Water
description: Water with a high salt content. Consuming will damage your health.

name: Salvaged Cleaver
description: A powerful 2-handed melee weapon with high damage.

name: Salvaged Sword
description: A powerful melee weapon made from a filed-down wrench. Great durability, good damage.

name: Santa Hat
description: A santa hat. Ho Ho ho.

name: 4x Zoom Scope
description: A small 4x zoom scope

name: Semi-Automatic Rifle
description: A Semi Automatic Rifle

name: Semi Automatic Body
description: The firing mechanism of a semi automatic weapon.

name: Sewing Kit
description: A Sewing kit. Used to make advanced clothing

name: Sheet Metal
description: Sheet metal scraps

name: Salvaged Shelves
description: Shelves for item stacking

name: Shirt
description: A smart casual shirt

name: Tank Top
description: A tshirt without sleeves

name: Boots
description: Work boots.

name: Double Barrel Shotgun
description: A Shotgun. Fires a two rounds with a wide spread before needing a reload

name: Pump Shotgun
description: A Shotgun. Fires six rounds.

name: Waterpipe Shotgun
description: A Shotgun. Fires a single round before reloading.

name: Metal horizontal embrasure
description: Static shutter that form a metal horizontal embrasure over your window frame

name: Metal Vertical embrasure
description: Static shutter that form a metal vertical embrasure over your window frame

name: Wood Shutters
description: Wood shutters that you can open and close.

name: Large Banner Hanging
description: A large banner hanging on a wall

name: Two Sided Hanging Sign
description: A double sided hanging sign, to attach to buildings

name: Two Sided Ornate Hanging Sign
description: A double sided hanging sign, to attach to buildings

name: Landscape Picture Frame
description: A landscape oriented canvas for artists paintings

name: Portrait Picture Frame
description: A portrait oriented canvas for artists paintings

name: Tall Picture Frame
description: A tall canvas for artists paintings

name: XL Picture Frame
description: An extra large canvas for artists paintings

name: XXL Picture Frame
description: A double extra large canvas for artists paintings

name: Large Banner on pole
description: A large banner hanging on a pole

name: Double Sign Post
description: A double sign post that you can plant into terrain

name: Single Sign Post
description: A single sign post that you can plant into terrain

name: One Sided Town Sign Post
description: A one sided town sign post, that you can plant into terrain

name: Two Sided Town Sign Post
description: A double sided town sign post, with roof, that you can plant into terrain

name: Huge Wooden Sign
description: A 6-meter by 3-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

name: Large Wooden Sign
description: A 3-meter by 1.5-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

name: Wooden Sign
description: A 2-meter by 1-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

name: Small Wooden Sign
description: A 1-meter by 0.5-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

name: Silencer
description: Significantly reduces the sound of gunfire, and completely removes any visible muzzle flash.

name: Human Skull
description: A human skull.

name: Wolf Skull
description: A wolf skull.

name: Sleeping Bag
description: A sleeping bag. Placing this will give you a location to respawn.
descriptions: 300 second cooldown between respawns. Triggers cooldown on all beds within 50m.

name: Small Oil Refinery
description: A small refinery which can produce Low Grade Fuel from Crude Oil.

name: Small Stash
description: A hidden, burried stash to keep your items safe. After placing, return to the stash and aim at the ground where you hid it and it will reveal itself.

name: Small Trout
description: A Small Trout. Good for a few meals

name: Small Water Bottle
description: A Small Water Bottle. Left click to drink, right click to fill from water sources, or to pour out

name: Custom SMG
description: A rapid-firing Machine Gun. Sacrifices accuracy and distance for speed.

name: SMG Body
description: The firing mechanism of a submachinegun. Used in construction of a weapon that can fire pistol ammo fully automatic

name: Stone Spear
description: A stone-tipped wooden Spear. Slightly longer range

name: Wooden Spear
description: A wooden Spear.

name: Wooden Floor Spikes
description: A set of spikes that will slow down and hurt anyone that walks over them.

name: Metal Spring
description: A metal spring. Used to provide motion or resistance in objects

name: Sticks
description: Some long, some short

name: SUPER Stocking
description: A SUPER Stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get an awesome gift!

name: Small Stocking
description: A small stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get a gift! Collect 6 to upgrade to a SUPER Stocking

name: Stone Pick Axe
description: A stone Pickaxe.

name: Stone Hatchet
description: A stone Hatchet.

name: Stones
description: Stones.

name: Sulfur
description: Sulfur is commonly used in gunpowder, medicine, and matches. Matches release sulfur dioxide when they burn, giving them their smell. Sulfur is an essential component to living cells. Many proteins contain sulfur. It is also used as a pesticide on organic farms.

name: Sulfur Ore
description: A rock containing sulfur. The sulfur can be extracted using a furnace.
descriptions: Can be cooked for 5 seconds to get x1 Sulfur

name: Supply Signal
description: Green signal smoke. Use to mark a location for an airdrop.

name: Survey Charge
description: Use this on the terrain to see which resources are available for mining.

name: Survival Fish Trap
description: Traps fish, place on the shore and load with bait.

name: Medical Syringe
description: Heal yourself or others with this syringe. Left-click heals you, right-click heals a target.

name: Targeting Computer
description: A computer loaded with software that can analyze a video and produce rotational deltas to individual objects contained in the feed

name: Tarp
description: A waterproof tarp

name: Tech Trash
description: A collection of random tech parts

name: Thompson
description: A medium damage machine gun.

name: Torch
description: A Torch. Lights your way at night and can be used as a weapon.

name: T-Shirt
description: A t-shirt with very short sleeves.

name: Longsleeve T-Shirt
description: A t-shirt with long sleeves.

name: High External Stone Wall
description: A high stone wall used to keep people off your property.

name: High External Wooden Wall
description: A high wooden wall used to keep people off your property.

name: Prison Cell Gate
description: A prison cell gate to lock things behind bars

name: Prison Cell Wall
description: A prison cell wall

name: Chainlink Fence Gate
description: A Chainlink Fence Gate

name: Chainlink Fence
description: A Chainlink Fence

name: Shop Front
description: A shop front to do commerce

name: Metal Window Bars
description: Metal window bars made to fit a normal sized window

name: Reinforced Window Bars
description: Window bars to fit a standard window. These bars are made out of reinforced metal and contain a thick surround to protect from incoming projectiles.

name: Wooden Window Bars
description: Window bars made out of wood. They'll stop people climbing through your window, but probably not for very long.

name: Water
description: Water. Drinking it will alleviate your thirst.

name: Large Water Catcher
description: Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew.

name: Small Water Catcher
description: Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew.

name: Water Barrel
description: A storage container for water

name: Water Jug
description: A large jerry can for water

name: Water Purifier
description: A Water Purifier. Place overtop of a campfire. Will provide clean, potable water from salty, or stagnant water

name: Wood
description: Wood. Collected from trees and used in many crafting recipes. It's also needed to cook in camp-fires.

name: Wood Chestplate
description: A shoddy piece of body armor made from Wood and Cloth.

name: Wood Armor Pants
description: A shoddy piece of leg armor made from Wood and Cloth.
